title: CLSA Partners with Citi to Deliver a Real-Time Delivery Versus Payment Solution for Shanghai and Shenzhen Connect
summary: Hong Kong - CLSA Ltd. has partnered with Citi to offer institutional investors real-time delivery versus payment (DVP) settlement for transactions in China A-Shares through Shanghai Connect and Shenzhen Connect.
tag-1: CLSA Partners with Citi to Deliver a Real-Time Delivery Versus Payment Solution for Shanghai and Shenzhen Connect
tag-2: Hong Kong – CLSA Ltd. has partnered with Citi to offer institutional investors real-time delivery versus payment (DVP) settlement for transactions in China A-Shares through Shanghai Connect and Shenzhen Connect.
tag-3: Investors who appoint both Citi as their SPSA custodian or subcustodian through their global custodian and CLSA as one of their multiple execution brokers can benefit from receiving cash proceeds earlier and thereby minimizing counterparty risk.
tag-4: "CLSA has always been committed to providing high quality value-added financial services for clients," said Xen Gladstone, Group Head of Sales, Trading & Execution at CLSA. "In partnering with Citi, we are able to support our clients with a real-time DVP SPSA settlement solution to reduce their risk exposures for Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Connect."
tag-5: "Citi has a long-standing relationship with CLSA and we are honored to enable them to deliver a real-time DVP solution for their clients to better manage their operational risks associated with trading China A-shares though Shanghai and Shenzhen Connect." said Cindy Chen, Managing Director and Hong Kong Head of Securities Services at Citi.
tag-6: "Citi is the first provider to offer a multi-broker DVP solution which expands the number of brokers to allow investors to better comply with regulatory requirements and reduce contingency risks," continued Chen. "This is important as investors prepare for the eventual inclusion of China A-shares into global indices."
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.

tag-9: CLSA Limited CLSA is Asia's leading and longest running brokerage and investment group. The company provides equity broking, corporate finance & capital markets and asset management services to global corporate and institutional clients.
tag-10: Renowned for service excellence, product innovation and award-winning market intelligence CLSA has provided independent equity research, sales and trading since 1986. CLSA is one of the largest brokerages in Asia and with exchange membership in every developed market in the region, plus Australia and the Americas, CLSA provides best execution across a range of products and services.
tag-11: Through CITIC CLSA Securities, the group's corporate finance and capital markets team leads equity public offerings (primary and secondary), debt issuances and M&A advisory. Direct investment is offered through diversified, alternative investment vehicles by CLSA Capital Partners.
tag-12: Headquartered in Hong Kong, CLSA's 1,500 dedicated professionals operate from 20 cities across Asia, Australia, the Americas and Europe. CLSA's parent company CITIC Securities is China's leading investment bank.
tag-13: Citi Direct Custody and Clearing Citi Direct Custody and Clearing provides securities settlement, clearing and asset servicing solutions globally to broker-dealers, custodian banks and infrastructures as well as select institutional investors including corporations, financial institutions and public sector entities through its proprietary network in over 60 markets. The scale of this network, provided through its own offices and staffed with Citi experts in each market, sets Citi apart from the competition.
tag-14: Through its proprietary network, Citi delivers the highest standards of technology and processes, as well as a level of expertise, quality and consistency that is unmatched. The market knowledge and relationships created by such a widespread local presence enables Citi to develop new industry solutions and help lead the process of change in the securities marketplace.
